import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './SetupScreen.css'; function SetupScreen({ onComplete }) { const [founderName, setFounderName] = useState(''); const [industry, setIndustry] = useState(''); const [startupName, setStartupName] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (founderName && industry && startupName) { onComplete({ founderName, industry, startupName }); } }; return (
